definition: any of various very large, aquatic, marine mammals (order Cetacea) that have a torpedo-shaped body with a thick layer of blubber, paddle-shaped forelimbs but no hind limbs, a horizontally flattened tail, and nostrils that open externally at the top of the head, cetacean â€” see baleen whale, toothed whale
one that is impressive especially in size
examples: a whale of a good time
